steps.name: 1. Reset box sizing
notes: What is the box sizing? What are the alternatives? What is the default? ❌
Why do we need the `::before` and `::after` pseudo-elements? These pseudo-elements control the content **inside** the tags but **before / after** the actual content. __*but why do we need them?*__❌

steps.name: 2. Make multimedia responsive
steps.solution: img, picture, svg, video { display: block; max-width: 100%; }
notes: Why do we need `display: block`? What's the default? ❌

steps.name: 3. Make all text inherit the font
steps.solution: input, textarea, button, select { font: inherit; }
